description:
A 29er tire that's designed for aggressive XC trails riding. The fast-rolling tread suits racers or aggressive riders looking for a lightweight tire to perform in all conditions.

  • 3C MaxxTerra 3-layer compound balances speed and grip by stacking soft and hard rubber on the shoulder lugs and medium and hard rubber in the center
  • Tires are foldable and tubeless ready
  • EXO protected sidewalls prevent slashes without affecting ride quality
name: Maxxis Rekon 29in.TR 3C Maxx Terra EXO Folding Tire
